data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gasca, Rebeca, Haddock, Steven H. D. (2016): The rare deep-living hyperiid amphipod Megalanceoloides remipes (Barnard, 1932): complementary description and symbiosis. Zootaxa 4178 (1): 138-144, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4178.1.7|1 occurrence
